decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Location Plan,	 			Received 03/11/14
Barrier Specifications, 			Received 9/1/15
DesignLSM Exterior proposal, 		Received 19/1/15
Exterior seating layout 02-02		Received 19/1/15
Screen elevations 09-02			Received 19/1/15
Breezefree brochure			Received 19/1/15
Exterior Visual, External Seating		Received 19/2/15
Proposed screen elevations 09-02 A	Received 19/2/15
Site Context Plan 02-03			Received 19/2/15
 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The outdoor seating area hereby approved shall not be implemented until the relevant traffic order has been made and appropriate signage has been put up.

Condition : 4 - The outdoor seating area, hereby approved shall not be put in place or used outside of the following hours: 18.00- 22.00 Monday to Friday and 10.00 - 22.00 Saturday and Sunday. All tables, chairs and associated barriers or furniture shall be removed immediately outside of these hours.
description: Creation of outdoor sitting area to the front of the restaurant
